text: Jack Thomas Brownell (born 3 August 1999) is an English professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Spalding United. ==Career== Brownell joined Chesterfield at U16 level and signed a professional contract with the club in April 2017. His contract was not renewed by Chesterfield at the end of the 2017–18 season.
